name: Grey It Out!
description:
Grey It Out! a minimalist 2D arcade game.

One mission - Hit the colored objects to make them lose their color and fall of the screen.

A little luck will be required to finish.
A great time killer.

FEATURES:

- Minimalist design
- Physics gameplay
- Challenging and addictive gameplay
- Free to play
- Easy to learn but hard to complete
- One touch control
- Beat dozens of levels - more coming
- Challenge friends and foes for the high score

Don't forget to review to help improve the game.

Made with Unity.
